name: Food Fight (itch) (Sacred_Spaz)
description:
A Pokémon-style game with food related monsters that you can craft and battle with

How To Play:

Move the character using WASD 

Access your various UI screens using the toggle buttons at the top left and right side of screen

*Cheat* Pressing the ‘Z’ key within the Inventory screen gives access to a button that gives one of every Recipe Ingredient to the player

Recipes can be created using their associated buttons

The players primary Monster can be swapped out using the Party Inventory backpack buttons

A Monster can be released via the Release Menu

Within combat you must first choose to either Fight or Flee

Choosing Fight will open up the Ability Menu, choosing an Ability will trigger it’s effects

Hitting certain monsters with specific abilities will award the player with monster-specific Ingredient drops

Escape key exits game
